code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function DiagnosisResult(_ref){let{result}=_ref;const handleDownload=format=>{const content=format==='json'?JSON.stringify(result,null,2):"\u5206\u6578: ".concat(result.score,"\n\u5EFA\u8B70: ").concat(result.suggestions.join(', '));const blob=new Blob([content],{type:'text/plain;charset=utf-8'});const link=document.createElement('a');link.href=URL.createObjectURL(blob);link.download="diagnosis_result.".concat(format);link.click();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\u5065\u8A3A\u7D50\u679C"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u5206\u6578\uFF1A",result.score]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:result.suggestions.map((s,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:s},i))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDownload('json'),children:"\u4E0B\u8F09 JSON"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDownload('txt'),children:"\u4E0B\u8F09 TXT"})]});}export default DiagnosisResult;
